positions.description: Main entrance of the Gas Station, suitable for vehicle or character entry.
Fuel pump area, ideal for vehicle refueling scenes.
Cashier area inside the Gas Station, suitable for dialogue or transaction scenes.
Parking lot adjacent to the Gas Station, suitable for vehicle parking or ambush scenes.
Rooftop of the Gas Station, offering a strategic vantage point.

paths.description: A straight path from the main entrance to the fuel pump area.
A narrow path leading from the fuel pump area to the cashier area.
A straight path from the cashier area to the parking lot.
A staircase connecting the parking lot to the rooftop.
A curved path from the main entrance to the parking lot.

obstacles.description: A slippery oil spill blocking the path to the cashier area.
An abandoned car blocking the path to the parking lot.
A damaged staircase leading to the rooftop, requiring careful navigation.
A temporary construction barrier partially blocking the curved path to the parking lot.
